course_description: Prerequisites: BIOS 510 or permission of instructor. Fundamental concepts in statistical inference will be covered including: statistical models, sampling distributions, standard errors, asymptotic normality, confidence intervals, hypothesis tests, power analysis. Common frameworks for inference will be discussed including: parametric/likelihood-based inference, the delta method, bootstrap, permutation tests, Bayesian inference.
sections: Class Nbr: 4429, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 10:15a-12:05p, Instructor: Haber/Li, Status: Open
